record.description: Celebrating the 250th anniversary of [George Frideric] Handel's birth, the University of Chicago Chorus and Orchestra will appear in two performances of "Xerxes," the German composer's only comic opera. The animated chorus group, which will be seen tonight and tomorrow night in Mandel Hall includes, left to right: Rosalyn Siegel, Ruth Anne Heisey, Charity Moulton, Harriet Ann Trinkle, and Eleanor Lauer.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
